trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SEQ_00<tab>Yozan is ready to begin investigating.

TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SEQ_01<tab>Koharu has found the suspicious Lalafells, and is trailing them. Follow the rest of the Doman Adventurers' Guild to where she is hiding near the southeast gate of Revenant's Toll.

TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SEQ_02<tab>Koharu has found the cart and two of your four suspects. However, this brings up the question of how to prove the criminals' guilt. After a stroke of brilliance, Yozan and Rokka put on a show for the two Lalafells. They pretend that the stolen grimoire contains the location of a hidden treasure. Suitably persuaded, the two suspects run off. Meet with Yozan to the east of Camp Revenant's Toll in hopes of heading off the criminals.

TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SEQ_03<tab>Hiding in a gully, you watch as four Lalafells wander towards the camp, the stolen grimoire in hand. You and the Doman Adventurers' Guild rush towards them, revealing that the tale of treasure was all merely a ploy. In a fit of pique, the leader, Gagarua, calls for his allies to teach you a lesson. Speak with him, and defeat his henchmen should they attack you.
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SEQ_04<tab>You successfully fend off Gagarua's gang. Now speak with the man himself, and see if he will come quietly.

TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SEQ_05<tab>Upon realizing who you are, Gagarua calls his allies to him, and summons something down upon you from the skies. By the time you realize that this was all a trick, the criminals have run away. However, they have left the aged grimoire in their haste. Retrieve this valuable piece of evidence now.
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SEQ_06<tab>You have retrieved the grimoire from where it was left. Show it now to Yozan.

TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SEQ_07<tab>Yozan is happy that you now have the means to clear the name of the Doman Adventurers' Guild, and bids you present the aged grimoire to Slafborn back in Revenant's Toll forthwith.

TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SEQ_08<tab>Slafborn gratefully accepts the stolen grimoire, and listens to your tale exonerating the children. Yozan makes it clear that they are all adventurers now, and Slafborn agrees with the hint of a smile on his lips. He watches as the children run away, presumably to find some new quest, and asks that you guide them with a gentle hand, and protect them with your strong arm.
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Koharu.
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Yozan.
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Gagarua and defeat his henchmen.
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Gagarua.
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_TODO_04<tab>Pick up the aged grimoire.
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_TODO_05<tab>Speak with Yozan.
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_TODO_06<tab>Deliver the aged grimoire to Slafborn.
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_YOUZAN_000_000<tab><var 08 E905 ((Miss)) ((Mister)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, Koharu's found our suspects!
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_YOUZAN_000_001<tab>They've parked their cart around the southeast gate. Come on, let's go investigate. But be quiet─we don't want them to know we're onto them yet.
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_KOHARU_000_010<tab>I told you I'd find them!
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SHIUN_000_015<tab>What if they're armed? Shouldn't <var 1A 02 /var>we<var 1A 01 /var> have weapons, too?
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_ROKKA_000_020<tab>I don't know why Koharu thinks this is fun. We're supposed to be clearing our names, aren't we?
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_KOHARU_000_030<tab>See? See? Those are our Lalafells, all right!
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SHIUN_000_031<tab>But how do we prove they're our criminals? From here, it doesn't look like they've got the grimoire. Could it be hidden in their cart?
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_ROKKA_000_032<tab>The other two might have it as well. Or maybe...we've got the wrong people.
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_YOUZAN_000_033<tab>I think I've an idea of how to find out. Rokka, can you play along?
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_ROKKA_000_034<tab>Have you heard about Rowena's store? They're saying someone stole a grimoire from it!
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_YOUZAN_000_035<tab>That's old news! I think they've even given up hunting for the criminals. <sigh> It's too bad, though. I wanted that grimoire for myself.
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_ROKKA_000_036<tab>Why? Because it's got the location of the treasure─
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_YOUZAN_000_037<tab>Shhh! Do you want <var 1A 02 /var>everyone<var 1A 01 /var> to know about all the buried gold and jewels!? And what about the weapons, hm?

TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_YOUZAN_000_038<tab>They say those are stronger than the Empire's! I spent so much time learning that the treasure's in Camp Revenant's Toll, but I'll <var 1A 02 /var>never<var 1A 01 /var> find it now...
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_ROKKA_000_039<tab>Well, not without the grimoire, anyway. So why not just give up while you're ahead?

TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_WAWATON_000_040<tab>Did you hear that? The lad just said there's gold and silver and weapons out 'round that old camp! Ohoho, imagine how pleased the boss'll be with this! Come on, let's go!
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_LILINA_000_041<tab>I'm awake! I'm awa... Huh? Where'd you go?
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_WAWATON_000_042<tab>Move yourself, Sister! Time's a-wasting!
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_LILINA_000_043<tab>W-Wait! I can't run as fast as you!
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_KOHARU_000_044<tab>That was brilliant, Yozan! If they're our criminals, they'll show up at the camp with the grimoire.
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_ROKKA_000_045<tab>And if the other two are anything like that duo, we shouldn't have any trouble catching them.
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SHIUN_000_046<tab>That's a relief! I was expecting hardened criminals, but that lot couldn't frighten a baby horsebird.
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_YOUZAN_000_047<tab>We just have to beat them to Camp Revenant's Toll now. From the way they took the bait, I don't think we have much time. We'd better hurry!
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_YOUZAN_000_050<tab>Koharu, are you sure that's them?
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SHIUN_000_055<tab>We're good at passing unseen, but not in the middle of town! Mister Slafborn will see us if we're not really, really careful...
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_ROKKA_000_060<tab>Watching Koharu and Yozan work together is exciting, isn't it?

TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_YOUZAN_000_070<tab>I hope they'll come quietly. But if they don't, you'll have to take care of them, <var 08 E905 ((Miss)) ((Mister)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_GAGARUA_000_071<tab>Gold, jewels, weapons... All hidden somewhere in this dump, where no one would think to look.

TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_GAGARUA_000_072<tab>I think I'll take it all. Garlemald laid my homeland to waste, and so I'll use the riches to rebuild. And the weapons, oh, I will use them to make the world mine!
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_BABARA_000_073<tab>Of all the secrets of eld I thought this grimoire held, the location of a lost treasure was not one...
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_GAGARUA_000_074<tab>Well, 'tis but a matter of knowing where to look. Tell us─how do we read it? Is there a cipher? Or must we use some sort of incantation?
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_WAWATON_000_075<tab>Er... That is a good question! I'll be sure to tell you just as soon as I learn the answer!
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_GAGARUA_000_076<tab>WHAT!? You buffoon! Why did you not think to find out!?
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_WAWATON_000_077<tab>Erp! I...I'm sorry, Gagarua, it just didn't seem important at the time!
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_GAGARUA_000_078<tab>(-Gagarua-)Why you─ Hm? What are they doing...? Go play elsewhere. Adults are working here, children.
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_YOUZAN_000_079<tab>We're not children─we're the Doman Adventurers' Guild! We're here to arrest you for stealing the grimoire from Rowena's!
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_WAWATON_000_080<tab>Oh, oh! Gagarua, those are the children who talked about the treasure! <var 1A 02 /var>They'll<var 1A 01 /var> know how to read the grimoire for sure.
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_GAGARUA_000_081<tab>(-Gagarua-)...
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_BABARA_000_082<tab>You two have been had. I <var 1A 02 /var>knew<var 1A 01 /var> something smelled fishy about this.
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_GAGARUA_000_083<tab>(-Gagarua-)You prize pair of pinheads!

TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_GAGARUA_000_084<tab>(-Gagarua-)No one makes a fool of Gagarua, you hear me!? No one! We shall teach these younglings a painful lesson about meddling in others' affairs! Come, summon the <var 1A 02 /var>thing<var 1A 01 /var>!
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_BABARA_000_085<tab>What thi─ Oh, that. It's not here.
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_GAGARUA_000_086<tab>(-Gagarua-)...Why is that?
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_BABARA_000_087<tab>You sent it away, Gagarua. You said it would draw too much attention to us.
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_BABARA_000_088<tab><sigh> ...So <var 1A 02 /var>we'll<var 1A 01 /var> just do the dirty work, then?
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_KOHARU_000_090<tab>Oooh, this is all terribly exciting!
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SHIUN_000_095<tab>We learned how to wait silently and unseen in Doma. Yozan never took to it as well as we did, though...
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_ROKKA_000_100<tab>It's all very well waiting around for our criminals, but what do we do once they're here?
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_GAGARUA_000_110<tab><var 1A 02 /var>One<var 1A 01 /var> of you against all three of mine? Hah! You don't stand a...a mammet's chance in the hells!
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_YOUZAN_000_120<tab>Just do like you did with Mister Boulder, <var 08 E905 ((Miss)) ((Mister)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!

TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_KOHARU_000_125<tab>I'll leave them to you, <var 08 E905 ((Miss)) ((Mister)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. But someday, I'll show you what Miss Yda taught me!
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SHIUN_000_130<tab>This doesn't seem like a fair fight. Can we help? From back here, I mean.
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_ROKKA_000_135<tab>I'll heal you if you get hurt, <var 08 E905 ((Miss)) ((Mister)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Later. When I have a potion.
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_GAGARUA_000_140<tab>Twelve above, where did those younglings find so puissant a protector!?
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_BABARA_000_141<tab>I've got a feeling I've seen <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> before... Wait! Quick, everyone, come here!
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_BABARA_000_142<tab>It's little wonder we were outmatched─that is <var 29 EB02 /var>, the hero of the Scions!
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_WAWATON_000_143<tab>You don't mean the <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var> who's beaten a load of primals, and smashed the imperial...er, ultimatum weapon to bits!?

TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_GAGARUA_000_144<tab>We can discuss <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> deeds and why <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> is with the children later, Wawaton! Babara, Lilina, we must do as we practiced!

TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_GAGARUA_000_145<tab>Ahem... Well met, Scion! Yes, we know full well who you are. But hear me─you won't be adding <var 1A 02 /var>us<var 1A 01 /var> to your list of fallen foes! Are you ready, my friends?

TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_GAGARUA_000_146<tab>As our forefathers before us, we have a winged beast in our thrall, whose strength is so great as to tear primals in twain and turn brave men to whimpering wretches! O mighty Valefor, we summon you with our prayers─descend from the heavens, and vanquish our foes!
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_KOHARU_000_147<tab>...Isn't something supposed to happen?
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_YOUZAN_000_148<tab>Damn it, they got away!
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_ROKKA_000_149<tab>Hey! There they go. Faster than they look, aren't they?
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_YOUZAN_000_150<tab>That was a queer bunch, make no mistake! But they forgot one thing─the grimoire!
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_YOUZAN_000_160<tab>Come on, <var 08 E905 ((Miss)) ((Mister)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─get them!
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_KOHARU_000_165<tab>Wow! You beat them faster than you beat Mister Boulder, <var 08 E905 ((Miss)) ((Mister)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SHIUN_000_170<tab>Something tells me this isn't over...
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_ROKKA_000_175<tab>They're much better at talking about fighting than actually fighting...
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_YOUZAN_000_180<tab><var 08 E905 ((Miss)) ((Mister)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, get the grimoire.
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_KOHARU_000_185<tab>They seemed fun. I hope I can talk to them again, someday.
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SHIUN_000_190<tab>They turned tail and ran when they learned who you were, <var 08 E905 ((Miss)) ((Mister)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_ROKKA_000_195<tab>I wonder how those four are related...
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_YOUZAN_000_200<tab>Hah! Now that we've got the grimoire, all we need to do is show it to Mister Slafborn and explain what happened! Come on, what are we waiting for?
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SLAFBORN_000_210<tab>What did the Doman children have to say for themselves?
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SLAFBORN_000_211<tab>The younglings and the grimoire? So it is as I feared, and they are responsible for stealing it, yes?

TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SLAFBORN_000_212<tab>Gagarua? No, I cannot say I am familiar with him. But if you say he and his conspirators are to blame, then I will believe it. I will report to the guild, and ensure we all are on lookout for that gang.
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SLAFBORN_000_213<tab>Well, you may consider yourselves exonerated. That you reclaimed the grimoire and your good names says much of your bravery, younglings.
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_YOUZAN_000_214<tab>Mister Slafborn, we are <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> younglings!

TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_YOUZAN_000_215<tab>We are the Doman Adventurers' Guild! All the world will soon know our name, and one day, we'll even be more famous than <var 08 E905 ((Miss)) ((Mister)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SLAFBORN_000_216<tab>More famous than <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, eh? Well, I look forward to seeing that.
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SLAFBORN_000_217<tab>Well, as one adventurer to another, let me say well done! You outfitted yourselves with honor today, my friends!
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SLAFBORN_000_218<tab>What brave men and women they are becoming, eh? But they are still in the bloom of youth─growing, yet not fully grown.
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SLAFBORN_000_219<tab>They need a gentle hand to guide them, and a strong arm to protect them. Pray, friend, be that for them.
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_BALLOON_000_000<tab>Anyone who stands before Gagarua must fall!
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_BALLOON_000_010<tab>Hmph. You know your way around a fight, I'll give you that.
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_BALLOON_000_020<tab>Gods above, who <var 1A 02 /var>are<var 1A 01 /var> you!?
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_BALLOON_000_030<tab>Aaarrrggghhh!
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_BALLOON_000_040<tab>Lilina! Oi, Lilina! I'm hurting here!
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_BALLOON_000_050<tab><pant> Bloody tiring, this...
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_BALLOON_000_060<tab>Hm? What're we─ Oh, right!
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_BALLOON_000_070<tab>Ow! That'll leave a bump...
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_BALLOON_000_080<tab>Hrnnnggg! ...Oooh, I'm going down, I'm going down...
